t: Who can create a Brand Store?
Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - In 2004, Toys "R" Us sued Amazon, ... on the service in categories that Toys "R" Us had been granted exclusivity. In 2006, a court ruled in favor of Toys "R" Us, giving it the right to unwind its agreement with Amazon and establish its independent e-commerce website.
